titleStmt.title: The povver of kings discussed: or, An examen of the fundamentall constitution of the free-borne people of England: in answer to severall tenents of M. David Jenkins. By Will: Ball of Barkham, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Ball, William.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan. 30. 1648"; the "9" in the imprint has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
